name: The little hero and the terrifying dragon
name_original: The little hero and the terrifying dragon
description:
The Little Hero and the Terrifying Dragon

The little Hero and the terrifying dragon is a short game where you're not the hero. Your job is to help him to live an amazing adventure on stage.

Controls:

  • Move with ZQSD or arrows
  • Interract with E or spacebar

/!\ Spoiler /!\

The game is not very intuitive, if you are blocked here is the solution:

  1. Direct the light towards the lever
  2. Help the hero to use the lever
  3. Pull the rope once to attract the hero
  4. Pull the rope quickly to raise the hero to the platform, then hold it up until he comes back on it.
  5. Put on the dragon mask
  6. Enter the stage through the ceiling hatch
  7. Admire the joy on the hero's face when he succeeds in defeating the dragon !
